Title: Together in Heaven
Plot: Mickey and Shane think of a way to make some extra money. Their final idea was to make a child pornography site which contained no nude images and took the credit card details of those who subscribed. Their view on the matter was that they were doing a good thing by using the website as a deterant, however the police didn't see it that way.
ParentalRatingReason: Violence, offensive language, drug use & sexual material
